name: What Was that Movie? Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Pretty Woman.

	"Pretty Woman" is a modern day Cinderella story in which Julia Roberts plays Vivian a prostitute who is hired for the week by Edward (Richard Gere). They end up falling in love.

Dirty Dancing.

	"Dirty Dancing" is a film in which a dance instructor falls in love with a sixteen year old in the Catskills. One is rich one is poor, will their love work out?

questions.text: The Daughter of a King who is Getting Married
questions.explanation:
The Princess Bride.

	"The Princess Bride" is a story about how love conquers all. Buttercup thinks that Wesley was dead but it turned out he wasn't. He makes his way back to her and saves her from the evil Prince Humperdinck.

The Nutty Professor.

	"The Nutty Professor" staring Eddie Murphy is a remake of a 1963 movie of the same name. Prof. Sherman Klump is an overweight man who invents a potion to make himself skinny.

Cheaper by the Dozen.

	Steve Martin stars as a father who must take care of his twelve children. It is a remake of the 1950 movie of the same name.

Scent of a Woman.

	Al Pacino stars as Lieutenant Colonel Frank Slade, a man who helps a young man named Charlie (Chris O'Donnell). Charlie is accused of seeing a rule broken at school and not reporting it. Slade shows that the young man is not as bad as they say, but rather a man with integrity.

questions.text: At the House Without Anyone Else
questions.explanation:
Home Alone.

	"Home Alone" is the story of a young boy, Kevin McCallister (Culkin)who is left home alone when his family goes to France for Christmas.

Liar Liar.

	"Liar Liar" is about a man who is a lawyer and always telling lies. His son wishes that for 24 hours, his father has to tell the truth.  Editor's Note: Please do not send corrections about punctuation, as the official title of this film contains none.

questions.text: Beautiful in a Mixture of Red and White
questions.explanation:
Pretty in Pink.

	"Pretty in Pink" is about a girl in high school who doesn't have a lot of money. However, she still manages to date the rich good looking guy. Can their relationship survive their differences?

questions.text: Two Plus One Males and a Small Lass
questions.correct: Three Men and a Little Lady
questions.explanation:
Three Men and a Little Lady.

	"Three Men and a Little Lady" is the sequel to "Three Men and a Baby". Mary's mother is getting married. However, Peter (Selleck) is in love with her and has to find a way to stop the wedding and let her know how he feels.
